eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Utah; AT 05:01 PM ON NOV 26, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:01 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a non family abduction. The first suspect is identified as Christopher Thomas Wiggins. He is 5 feet 6 inches tall, weighing 120 pounds. He has blonde or strawberry hair and brown eyes. He was last seen wearing black pants black shirt black big o jacket hair is all purple in it. The first child abduction victim is identified by police as Jessika Francisco. She is 13 and was wearing dr pepper pajama pants white hoodie and pink slippers. She has blonde or strawberry hair and blue eyes. She is 4 feet 6 inches tall, weighing about 90 pounds. The abduction happened at Ogden. The suspect was driving a white 2013 Hyundai Sonata, with license plate A999FH. If you have any information, please call Police at 8 0 1 3 9 5 8 2 2 1 or simply dial 9 1 1.
